timeline.bodyText:
Can be moved into a separate method, say validatePartSize
and/or
a method that can validate the given combination of partSize and objectSize
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.bodyText: The part size calculation logic (including part from the if block) can be moved to a separate method, with a comment explaining the logic.
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.bodyText: In what scenario be pSize <= 0 at this place?
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: In case of input stream size is unknown, there is possibility that user could pass wrong  partSize <= 0
replies.author: balamurugana

timeline.bodyText: These two variables may not be required..
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.bodyText: There's a lot of overlap with PutObjectArgs. Can this be extracted out into a common base class?
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.author: anjalshireesh

timeline.bodyText: Some of the validations here are the same as those in PutObjectArgs. Might be a good idea to put them in a common method and call from both places.
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: This will be taken care when we add arg buildet to composeObject()

timeline.bodyText: Maybe just log/print the exception so that it can be debugged..
